welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rawtenstall, a charming town nestled in the beautiful countryside of the United Kingdom. Known for its history, quaint shops, and stunning views, we invite you to explore and experience all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport manages all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
